Disease.Name: PROPIONIC ACIDEMIA (PA, PCCA)
Disease.Synonym: KETOTIC HYPERGLYCINEMIA; PA; PROPIONIC ACIDEMIA; PCCA
Disease.Summary: rare (1:50000-200000);autosomal recessive ;prenatal diagnosis in amnion fluid;Since mild C3 elevations may be overlooked and considered non-diagnostic in isolation, we advise considering a diagnosis of propionic acidemia even in the absence of significant elevations 2-methylcitrate or 3-hydroxypropionate in urine organic acid analysis [Cappucio G et al. 2016]

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: basal ganglia, changes, lesions, calcifications (MRI, CT)
behavior, autism or autistic-like / behaviour, autism or autistic-like
behavior, hyperactive, restless / behaviour, hyperactive, restless

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS
LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
